snippet: Microsoft announced on Monday that it intends to double the amount and scope of media content offered over the next year through the company's Xbox Live online service. Beyond the creation of a new online music service called Xbox Music, Microsoft...
abstract: Microsoft announced on Monday that it intends to double the amount and scope of media content offered over the next year through the company's Xbox Live online service. Beyond the creation of a new online music service called Xbox Music, Microsoft announced that the National Basketball Association and the National Hockey League had agreed to make their extended programming packages available through Xbox Live.

headline.main: Microsoft to Expand Offerings on Xbox Live
